io.micronaut.crac.support

Interface CracContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCracContext
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface CracContext
    The gateway between Micronaut and the CRaC api. Takes our own internal resources, and uses them as delegates to the CRaC api.
    Since:
    3.7.0
    Author:
    Tim Yates

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void register(OrderedCracResource orderedCracResource)
      Create a Resource from the given OrderedCracResource and register it with the CRaC Context.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        void register(@NonNull
              OrderedCracResource orderedCracResource)
        Create a Resource from the given OrderedCracResource and register it with the CRaC Context.
        Parameters:
        orderedCracResource - CRaC Resource.
